overview: The as of yet unreleased 4th feature film from writer and director Josh Becker (Thou Shall Not Kill, The Evil Dead, Lunatics: A Love Story) IF I HAD A HAMMER is a period piece set in the summer of '64 just days before the Beatles appear on the Ed Sullivan show for the first time.  Goofy daydreamer Phil Buckley meets the cause caring Lorraine in a music store and the two hit it off, and agree to spend the evening together at a local beatnik coffee house which offer it's patrons an open mic to perform the then ever so popular "folk" music of the day.
title: If I Had A Hammer
